txt.en: Wisewood wants revenge upon the Orcs who attacked his grove. As a heroic Orc-slayer of many lands, how can you refuse such a deed?\n\nWisewood's limbs sleep, and he is too slow and sleepy to assist you, but you can do him a kindness as Gandalf wished.
You have defeated many Orcs in Fangorn to avenge the burned and felled trees of his grove.
Orcs are a terrible nuisance wherever they decide to take up residence. You should defeat the Orcs of Isengard as you see them in the forest, for they are as unwelcome here as they are anywhere.
White Hand warriors can be found in Fangorn near their encampment.\n\nYou should defeat White Hand warriors in Fangorn.
You have defeated many Orcs in Fangorn to avenge the burned and felled trees of his grove.
